channel.title: Comments on: New Web Page for the Tech Commons

item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/05/26/new-web-page-for-the-tech-commons/#comment-559">Andres Panado</a>.
Good question, Andy! The web team decided to keep 'Learning Tech Support', because 'tech support' is more easily understood by our patrons than 'tech commons'.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Andres Panado.

Good question, Andy! The web team decided to keep ‘Learning Tech Support’, because ‘tech support’ is more easily understood by our patrons than ‘tech commons’.

item.title: By: Andres Panado
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description:
Very nice and clean looking!
Quick question: Under "Course Support" on the homepage..it still says "Library Tech Support". Should it be renamed to "Library Tech Commons" for consistency? Not a big deal...just caught my eye, that is all.
item.content:encoded:
Very nice and clean looking!

Quick question: Under “Course Support” on the homepage..it still says “Library Tech Support”. Should it be renamed to “Library Tech Commons” for consistency? Not a big deal…just caught my eye, that is all.
